name: Detonating Kuriboh
effectText:
If a "Kuriboh" Monster Card is on the field: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. When your opponent activates a monster effect on the field (Quick Effect): You can equip this card you control to that opponent's monster as an Equip Spell with the following effect.
‚óèThe equipped monster's effects are negated.
You can only use each effect of "Detonating Kuriboh" once per turn.
